mapper.select: SELECT r.role_sign FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
